title: 8 More Chess Books on Openings (gnv64)
description:
Further to my earlier torrent, here is another collection of 8 more chess books on openings. All are in PDF format with covers:

1. Dutch Defence - New and Forgotten Ideas by Nikolai Minev, John Donaldson
2. Easy Guide to the Queen's Gambit Accepted by Graeme Buckley
3. How to Play Against 1 e4 by Neil McDonald
4. Play 1...b6! - A Dynamic and Hypermodern Opening System for Black by Christan Bauer
5. Starting Out - Queen's Gambit Declined by Neil MacDobald
6. The Philidor Files - Detailed Coverage of a Dynamic Opening by Christian Bauer
7. The Queen's Gambit Accepted - A Sharp and Sound Response to 1 d4 by Chris Ward
8. The Sniper - Play 1...g6, ...Bg7 and ...c5! by Charlie Storey
 
http://s16.postimg.org/3u6j3zohx/8_More_Chess_Books_on_Openings.jpg
